items.title: Public barred as Tanzanian president sworn in
items.description: President Samia faced little opposition with key rivals either imprisoned or barred from running.

items.title: Israeli military's ex-top lawyer arrested over leak of video allegedly showing Palestinian detainee abuse
items.description: Maj Gen Yifat Tomer-Yerushalmi resigned on Friday, admitting leaking a video allegedly showing abuse of a Palestinian detainee.

items.title: Drones seen over Belgian military base for third night, minister says
items.description: The country's Defence Minister Theo Francken said it looked like an espionage operation, but he wanted to be "cautious" about speculating.

items.title: Maldives bans smoking for younger generations
items.description: Anyone born on or after 1 January 2007 will be banned from using, buying or selling tobacco products in the archipelago.

items.title: Trump says he doubts US will go to war with Venezuela
items.description: The US president also suggests Nicol√°s Maduro's days as the South American country's leader are numbered.
